title: Adding the initial set of AI docs
body:
**Description of Change**

This repo is getting very large and has many concepts and areas that AI has to spend a lot of time investigating as well as making some incorrect assumptions. 

These new docs are an attempt to focus and direct AI (and some human) agents to understand and assist in contributing.

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

Labels will be applied to indicate the area of the issue related to documentation.

This issue is not a regression, as it pertains to the enhancement of documentation rather than a problem with existing functionality.

Additional remarks:
* The issue discusses the creation of documentation for AI but does not align with existing labels related to compatibility, performance, or reliability.
* There are no relevant labels for specific operating systems or backend technologies as the focus is solely on the documentation aspect.

<details>
<summary>Detailed Summary and Actions</summary>

Summary of the triage:

- The issue is focused on improving documentation to assist both AI and human agents in understanding the project.
- The addition of documentation does not relate to compatibility, performance, reliability, operating systems, or backend technologies.
- The label applied will specifically identify the area as documentation-related.

Summary of the actions that will be performed:

| Action       | Item          | Description                                                                 |
| :----------- | :------------ | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Apply Label  | area/Docs     | The issue is related to the addition of documentation for AI and human agents. |

</details>

_This entire triage process was automated by AI and mistakes may have been made. Please let us know so we can continue to improve._
